article.title: iRobot Receives $5.5 Million Army Order
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: iRobot Corporation has received a $5.5 million order from the U.S. Army Program Executive Office for Simulation, Training and Instrumentation (PEO STRI) for the delivery of 72 iRobot PackBot 510 with FasTac Kit robots, spare parts and repairs.
